entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Mirabel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:33 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
